long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that can help inject Datadog Synthetic headers to create a holistic end to end APM traces for debugging.  Useful when you want to create a Service map or a flame graph for a user journey to identify errors.  This extension comes in handy if you have to search for a specific APM trace in Datadog with multiple retention filters setup.
